name: rashid
bio: ”The Soaring Eagle of the Desert” that fights using parkour. With the wind as his ally, he outfoxes opponents with his high mobility. Born into nobility, he's a carefree but earnest man. Loves video streaming.
notlike: Fighting women and children,load times, trolls

moves.name: Standing Light Punch
moves.miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

moves.name: Standing Medium Kick
moves.miscellaneous: 2 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

moves.name: Crouching Light Punch
moves.miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

moves.name: Crouching Light Kick
moves.miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

moves.name: Crouching Heavy Punch
moves.miscellaneous: 2 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

moves.name: Crouching Heavy Kick
moves.miscellaneous: Knockdown time extended when attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter

moves.name: Jumping Medium Punch
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

moves.name: Jumping Heavy Punch
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a slam knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent on the 2nd attack

moves.name: Jumping Heavy Kick
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a slam knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent when transitioning from Wing Stroke or Arabian Skyhigh

moves.definition: Continue to hold forward and Rashid will break out into a sprint. Rashid will stop after covering a certain distance or if you release the input.
moves.name: Run

moves.definition: A low attack that can be performed during Run. Moves you behind the opponent when it hits.
moves.name: Backup
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 1 - 17

moves.definition: An attack that can be performed during Run. This multi-hitting attack lets you expand your mix-up game.
moves.name: Tempest Moon
[Air Current Boosted]Tempest Moon
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 20 - 35

moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack. The first attack can be canceled into special moves.
moves.name: Flapping Spin

moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.
moves.name: Beak Assault
moves.miscellaneous: Can be affected by air currents from frames 4 - 25

moves.definition: An advancing attack that's great against an opponent's low kicks.
moves.name: Crescent Kick

moves.definition: A jump attack that sends you bounding forward over your opponent when it hits or is blocked.
moves.name: Blitz Strike

moves.definition: A powerful move for dealing with opponents up above that can be performed during a neutral jump.
moves.name: Aerial Shot
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack that can be canceled into special moves.
moves.name: Rising Kick

moves.definition: A quick, advancing side flip. You can perform Front Flip from this move.
moves.name: Side Flip

moves.definition: Flip through the air towards the opponent. Jump attacks can be performed while in mid-air.
moves.name: Front Flip
[Air Current Boosted] M Spinning Mixer
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 10 -97

moves.name: [Air Current Boosted] L Eagle Spike
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 9 - 38

moves.name: [Air Current Boosted] M Eagle Spike
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 17 - 45

moves.name: [Air Current Boosted] H Eagle Spike
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 17 - 45

moves.name: M Whirlwind Shot(Longest possible button hold)

moves.name: H Whirlwind Shot(Longest possible button hold)
moves.miscellaneous: After technique is finished, an air current that lasts 60 frames will be generated

moves.miscellaneous: Transition to variation attack by holding the button for 36 frames

moves.name: OD Whirlwind Shot(Charged)
moves.miscellaneous: After technique is finished, an air current that lasts 60 frames will be generated

moves.name: L Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 21 - 22

moves.name: M Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 26- 27

moves.name: H Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 33 - 34

moves.definition: A majestic mid-air forward dash performed from Arabian Cyclone. Allows you to break into a jump attack at any point of the dash.
moves.name: Wing Stroke

moves.definition: A move performed from Arabian Cyclone that sends you rolling forward. A great technique for closing the distance from far or keeping the pressure on when you're up close.
moves.name: Rolling Assault

moves.definition: A rolling kick delivered out of Rolling Assault. Very effective as a follow up attack on opponents launched by Arabian Cyclone.
moves.name: Nail Assault

moves.definition: Grab the opponent, get them off balance, then send them tumbling with a kick. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.
moves.name: Riding Glider

moves.definition: Grab the opponent, disrupt their balance, then flip up before coming down with both feet to stomp them into the ground. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.
moves.name: Sunset Drop

moves.definition: Grab the opponent, ride on their back as you descend, then send them skidding along the ground on impact. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.
moves.name: Desert Slider
Backward Dash
moves.miscellaneous: Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.

moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.
moves.name: Drive Impact: Eagle Edge

moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.
moves.name: Drive Reversal: Eagle Slash

moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.
moves.name: Drive Parry

moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.
moves.name: Parry Drive Rush

moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.
moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
Cyclone Slicer
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Wall Jump
moves.definition: While jumping, kick off a wall to perform another jump.

moves.name: Spinning Mixer
moves.definition: Unleash multiple chops while spinning. Useful for combos and sequences, it also makes for a great anti-air attack.

moves.name: Eagle Spike
moves.definition: Bound forward while delivering a powerful flying kick. Deals high damage and is easy to use to tack on an additional hit at the end of a combo.

moves.name: Whirlwind Shot
moves.definition: Spin around quickly to whip up a whirlwind before launching it with a kick. Can be powered up by holding the attack button.

moves.name: Arabian Cyclone
moves.definition: A spinning kick attack that summons up a whirlwind in front of you. The move can be followed up with two different movement techniques.

moves.name: Arabian Skyhigh
moves.definition: Perform a spinning kick in mid-air that creates an air current that you then use to perform a mid-air jump. It's possible to perform jump attacks after the mid-air jump.

moves.name: Super Rashid Kick
moves.definition: Offload a devastating kick while soaring forward and up through the air. Landing the initial hit on a grounded opponent will increase the move's damage.

moves.name: Ysaar
moves.definition: Kick out with both legs to create a large advancing whirlwind. Movements or special moves that make contact with the whirlwind will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Altair
moves.definition: Twirl around and summon a whirlwind that lifts up your opponent, before Rashid barrages them with a series of powerful blows. A versatile move, perfect for combos, reversals, and as a way of dealing with projectiles.

moves.name: Lift Uppercut
moves.definition: A quick uppercut. Useful against jumping opponents.

moves.name: Delayed Ripper
moves.definition: A kick unleashed after stepping backward. Can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Assault Blade
moves.definition: A launching kick that can be canceled into special moves. It can be jumped out of on hit.

moves.name: Lift Combination
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack that can be canceled into special moves. If it connects, the second hit can be jumped out of.

moves.name: Grounded Sweep
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Swing Combination
moves.definition: A series of attacks, the first and second of which can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Cannon Strike
moves.definition: A descending kick performed from Hooligan Combination. If you cross over your opponent before activating this move, the kick will automatically turn around so it heads toward your opponent.

moves.name: Hooligan Combination
moves.definition: Perform a spinning jump through the air in a parabolic arc. While airborne, many other moves can be performed out of this one.

moves.name: Razor's Edge Slicer
moves.definition: A low kick performed after landing from Hooligan Combination. This move is performed if nothing is input during the Hooligan Combination.

moves.name: Reverse Edge
moves.definition: A downward kick performed from Hooligan Combination. It is an overhead attack that cannot be blocked crouching, making it useful for breaking through an opponent's guard.

moves.name: Fatal Leg Twister
moves.definition: A throw performed from Hooligan Combination. It can grab opponents who are standing while on the ground and does massive damage.

moves.name: Silent Step
moves.definition: A quick descent performed from Hooligan Combination. This fast maneuver is useful as a feint after making an opponent think you're about to attack.

moves.name: Rough Landing
moves.definition: Latch onto your opponent and whirl around them before smashing their face into the ground. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Delta Throw
moves.definition: Grab your opponent's head between your legs and perform a spin that tosses them behind you, switching places with them.

moves.name: Leg Scissors Choke
moves.definition: Grab an airborne opponent between your legs and drive their head into the ground. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Spin Raider
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Countersnipe
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Spiral Arrow
moves.definition: A spinning kick with both legs that travels low along the ground. Useful for launching surprise attacks from a distance or used out of normal moves to create combos.

moves.name: Cannon Spike
moves.definition: From a low stance, kick upward while rising into the air. It is invincible against jumping attacks, making it useful as an anti-air attack.

moves.name: Quick Spin Knuckle
moves.definition: Take a spinning hop forward and strike with the back of your fist. Useful for continuing your offensive pressure or as a way to slip through an opponent's guard.

moves.name: Spin Drive Smasher
moves.definition: A forward-moving combination attack consisting of a Spiral Arrow followed by a Cannon Spike. It has invincibility on startup, making it useful for turning the tables.

moves.name: Killer Bee Spin
moves.definition: Jump into the air, seize your opponent with a quick descending kick, and perform a chokehold on them. This move executes quickly, making it easy to combo into from grounded moves.

moves.name: Aerial Killer Bee Spin
moves.definition: Performed while airborne, seize your opponent with a quick descending kick and perform a chokehold on them. Easy to combo into from aerial specials.

moves.name: Delta Red Assault
moves.definition: Send your opponent to their knees with a series of high-speed attacks and finish with a powerful kick. A highly versatile move, useful both in combos and as a way of dealing with projectiles.

moves.name: Horn Breaker
moves.definition: An attack with long reach that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Squall Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Great Spin
moves.definition: A body press with an area of attack so wide that it can hit an opponent even if it crosses over them.

moves.name: Double Arrow
moves.definition: A combination attack that is useful against jumping opponents.

moves.name: Condor Dive
moves.definition: While airborne, diagonally descend with a powerful tackle. Useful for making surprise attacks from the air or as a way to counterattack someone after dodging a projectile.

moves.name: OD Condor Dive
moves.definition: A more powerful Condor Dive. Can also be used after an OD Tomahawk Buster.

moves.name: Canyon Throw
moves.definition: Grab an opponent's leg with your war clubs and toss them into the air. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Falling Cliff
moves.definition: Grab an opponent's head between your war clubs and toss them behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Earth's Rage
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Cross Hammer
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Ridge Thrust
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Desert Storm
moves.definition: A sequence of attacks that deals big damage.

moves.name: Condor Wind
moves.definition: Twirl your clubs above your head to summon and envelop yourself in wind. This will grant you one Windclad stock, which powers up certain special moves.

moves.name: Condor Spire
moves.definition: Leap into the air and charge forward while remaining low to the ground. Useful as a way of approaching from a distance.

moves.name: Tomahawk Buster
moves.definition: Use the momentum of swinging your arms to diagonally leap into the air with a tackle. It is invincible against jumping attacks, making it useful as an anti-air attack.

moves.name: Mexican Typhoon
moves.definition: Grab your opponent with both war clubs and smash them into the ground with a spinning slam. Useful for slipping through an opponent's guard at close range.

moves.name: Breezing Hawk
moves.definition: After the attack begins, you'll unleash a series of spinning attacks centered around your opponent. It is slow to come out, but it does lots of damage and is invincible at the start.

moves.name: Thunderbird
moves.definition: Remaining in place, leap directly upwards while unleashing a series of spinning attacks. It executes quickly, making it useful as an anti-air attack or as a way to turn the tables while doing lots of damage.

moves.name: Soaring Thunderbird
moves.definition: Thunderbird performed while airborne. It is primarily useful as a way to finish air combos.

moves.name: Raging Typhoon
moves.definition: A more powerful Mexican Typhoon in which you smash your opponent into the ground twice. Can be used to slip through an opponent's guard at close range and deal tons of damage all at once.

moves.name: Hellstab
moves.definition: A quick thrust that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Knee Hammer
moves.definition: A knee strike with long reach and quick recovery time.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.definition: A headbutt that can be canceled into a special move and lets you act before your opponent, even if they block it.

moves.name: Big Stampede
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Flying Body Press
moves.definition: A body press with an area of attack so wide that it can hit an opponent even if it crosses over them.

moves.name: Flying Headbutt
moves.definition: A headbutt that can be canceled into aerial special moves.

moves.name: Double Lariat
moves.definition: A lariat performed by extending both arms and spinning. Invulnerable to projectiles during the duration of the spin.

moves.name: Borscht Dynamite
moves.definition: Grab a mid-air opponent, juggling them and then smashing them into the ground with a spinning slam. Can only be used against airborne opponents.

moves.name: Russian Suplex
moves.definition: Grab an opponent and slam them into the ground with two powerful suplexes. This move will only activate when close to an opponent. When far away, Siberian Express will activate instead.

moves.name: Tundra Storm
moves.definition: Counter an opponent's grounded kick and throw them. Can only be used against certain attacks, but makes up for that limitation with its big damage.

moves.name: Bodyslam
moves.definition: Lift an opponent above your head and toss them into the ground back-first. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Capture Suplex
moves.definition: Grab an opponent and slam them to the ground while leaping backwards. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: German Suplex
moves.definition: Grab an opponent from behind and, arching your back, smash them into the ground. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Spinebuster
moves.definition: Lift your opponent up and fall on top of them with their back to the ground. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Russian Drop
moves.definition: Disrupt your opponent's balance with a kick, then smash their head into the ground as you fall backwards. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Brain Buster
moves.definition: Lift your opponent upside-down and send them flying to the ground behind you back-first. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Double Russian Chop
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Reverse Russian Kick
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Machine Gun Chops
moves.definition: A potent series of chops. Hits repeatedly if the first hit connects as a counter hit.

moves.name: Power Stomps
moves.definition: A series of attacks, the third of which can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Smetana Dropkick
moves.definition: A dropkick that is effective at countering an opponent's sweep.

moves.name: Cyclone Wheel Kick
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Screw Piledriver
moves.definition: Throw an opponent, leap into the air, and smash them into the ground with a spinning slam. Its high damage and long reach make it a key part of a grappler's arsenal.

moves.name: Siberian Express
moves.definition: Run to an opponent and grab them before slamming them to the ground with a devastating powerbomb. When you're at a longer distance from the opponent, this is useful for making a surprise attack or breaking through their blocks.

moves.name: Aerial Russian Slam
moves.definition: Jump diagonally upward, grabbing an airborne opponent before viciously slamming them into the ground. Useful as an anti-air counter when predicting your opponent's jumps or when worked into combos.

moves.name: Cyclone Lariat
moves.definition: Rotate at high speeds to pull in an opponent and grab them before slamming them into the ground with a powerful throw. You can choose what direction to throw your opponent by inputting left or right during the throw.

moves.name: Bolshoi Storm Buster
moves.definition: A powerful throw that puts an opponent in a finishing hold with pro-wrestling flair. Can be used to slip through an opponent's guard at close range and deliver massive damage.

moves.name: Guillotinna
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Malice
moves.definition: An attack with long reach that knocks opponents down.

moves.name: Bylina
moves.definition: A launching kick that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Zilant
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Zilant Mid
moves.definition: An overhead attack performed out of Zilant that cannot be blocked crouching.

moves.name: Zilant Low
moves.definition: A low attack performed out of Zilant that cannot be blocked standing.

moves.name: Departure: Window
moves.definition: Instantly warp to the active Departure. Jumping attacks can be used upon exiting the warp.

moves.name: Departure: Shadow
moves.definition: Spawn thorns from a placed Departure at a timing of your choosing. Useful for checking opponents with thorns at a different timing than if they were left to spawn automatically.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.definition: Ward off an opponent's attack while sticking them with a bomb of Psycho Power. The bomb will detonate after a period of time, damaging the opponent.

moves.name: Embrace
moves.definition: A throw that sends a clone to grapple with the opponent and explode with Psycho Power. The amount of time it takes for the grab to execute depends on the distance from your opponent.

moves.name: Ravina
moves.definition: Grab your opponent by the arm, disrupt their balance, and stab them with your staff. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Uragan
moves.definition: Grab your opponent by the arm, push their back, and send them tumbling behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Tornado
moves.definition: Grab your opponent's arm while airborne and toss them to ground behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Espada
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Exilio
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Grom Strelka
moves.definition: A quick series of attacks that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Triglav
moves.definition: Thrust your staff into the ground, causing thorns of Psycho Power to emerge at a distant location. Useful in combos and as a way to check opponents from a distance.

moves.name: Stribog
moves.definition: Perform a forward swing with your staff to generate a barrier of Psycho Power. Effective for tacking on additional damage in combos or as a way to get your opponent away from you.

moves.name: Departure
moves.definition: Place a void of Psycho Power in the air from which thorns spawn. Useful as a way of limiting your opponent's movement when vying for position.

moves.name: Torbalan
moves.definition: Craft a clone out of Psycho Power and send it flying at your opponent. Useful for checking your opponent and causing damage at long range.

moves.name: Chornobog
moves.definition: Fire two interlocked shockwaves of Psycho Power directly forward. Easy to work into combos or to use as a counter attack, even when performed at close range.

moves.name: Lovushka
moves.definition: Generate clones to attack your opponent from all directions. Can be used to make combos utilizing your clones, or as a way of breaking through your opponent's guard.

moves.name: Interdiction
moves.definition: Grab your opponent and send Psycho Power flowing through their body, causing them to explode from within. You will instantly warp to your opponent upon activating this move, making it useful in a variety of situations.

moves.name: Light Two Hitter
moves.definition: A rapid series of attacks.

moves.name: Medium Two Hitter
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Heavy Two Hitter
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack that allows you to move first even if blocked.

moves.name: Volare Combo
moves.definition: A series of attacks performed while jumping.

moves.name: Caelum Arc
moves.definition: A move with an area of attack so wide that it can even hit opponents who are behind you.

moves.name: Magna Bunker
moves.definition: A forward-moving attack that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Gaia Bash
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Novacula Swipe
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack that can knock an opponent down.

moves.name: Novacula Thrust
moves.definition: A combination attack that hits twice against standing opponents.

moves.name: Scutum
moves.definition: A defensive maneuver in which you cover your head with both arms, giving armor to your upper body and automatically countering your opponent's attacks if hit. If you continue holding the button following a counter, you will return to the Scutum stance.

moves.name: Procella
moves.definition: A sweeping kick that can be performed from Scutum. It is a low attack with long reach that cannot be blocked standing, making it useful for surprise attacks.

moves.name: Enfold
moves.definition: A throw that can be performed from Scutum. Pin your opponent to the ground and pound them with a single powerful punch. Useful as a way to break through the guard of an opponent who is expecting Scutum to be followed by a punch or kick.

moves.name: SA1 Javelin of Marisa(Physical counter version)
Mounted Grace
moves.definition: Grab an opponent by the leg to send them tumbling to the ground, and punch them from above. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Ponte Milvio
moves.definition: Lift an opponent up on your shoulders and then toss them behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Secutor
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Love Tap
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Marisa Style
moves.definition: Hold the button at the start of a heavy attack to increase its power.

moves.name: Malleus Breaker
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack that cannot be blocked crouching.

moves.name: Falx Crusher
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack with long reach.

moves.name: Gladius
moves.definition: A devastating straight punch. Can be powered up by holding the attack button.

moves.name: Dimachaerus
moves.definition: An uppercut with a wide swing followed by a second punch that slams an opponent to the ground. Useful when used out of normal or unique attacks to create combos.

moves.name: Phalanx
moves.definition: Leap into the air and come down with a powerful downward punch. Allows you to move first even if it is blocked, making it effective for continuing offensive pressure.

moves.name: Quadriga
moves.definition: Hop forward with a powerful front kick. Useful as a surprise attack that allows you to close the distance with your opponent, and can also be used to tack on additional hits in combos.

moves.name: Tonitrus
moves.definition: A two-hit attack that can be performed from Scutum. The first hit is an overhead attack that cannot be blocked crouching, making it useful for penetrating defenses.

moves.name: Javelin of Marisa
moves.definition: Bring a full-power punch down on your opponent with a wide swing. Hold the button to increase its damage.

moves.name: Meteorite
moves.definition: Leap into the air with a tackle and descend with a single devastating punch. Useful as an anti-air attack or as a way to tack on big damage at the end of a combo.

moves.name: Goddess of the Hunt
moves.definition: After sending your opponent to their knees with a vicious tackle, hit them with a devastating punch that sends them flying against the wall. A versatile move that can counter projectiles, be used in combos, and can turn the tables when under pressure.

moves.name: Révérence
moves.definition: A quick attack that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Croisee
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: À Terre
moves.definition: A quick combination attack that pulls your opponent toward you.

moves.name: Temps Lié
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack that pulls your opponent toward you.

moves.name: Allongé
moves.definition: A two-hit combination attack. Useful against jumping opponents.

moves.name: L Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
M Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
H Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
OD Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
L Renversé(Attack changes according to Medal level)
OD Renversé(Attack changes according to Medal level)
Grand Fouetté
moves.definition: A kick that can be performed from the forward lunge in Renversé. Useful in combos or as a way of checking opponents from mid-range.

moves.name: Ouchi Gari
moves.definition: Grapple with your opponent, slipping your leg between theirs and tossing them to the ground. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Uchi Mata
moves.definition: Grapple with your opponent, slipping your leg between theirs and lifting them over you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Glissade
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Écarté
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Tomoe Derrière
moves.definition: A kick with long reach that launches opponents into the air.

moves.name: En Haut
moves.definition: A two-hit series of attacks, the second of which cannot be blocked crouching.

moves.name: Manège Doré
moves.definition: Grab your opponent at close range, disrupt their balance, and toss them to the ground with a powerful throw. Landing this move will raise your medal level, and the move's effect will change depending on that level.

moves.name: Rond-point
moves.definition: A swift, upwards kick performed while spinning. Useful in combos or, if done early, as an anti-air attack.

moves.name: Dégagé
moves.definition: A powerful thrusting kick performed with all the grace of ballet. Useful for catching opponents by surprise and slipping through their guard.

moves.name: Renversé
moves.definition: Spin toward your opponent and grab them before sending them flying. Landing this move will raise your medal level, and the move's effect will change depending on that level.

moves.name: Arabesque
moves.definition: A kick performed while sliding forward along the ground that sends your opponent flying. This move is invincible on startup, making it useful as a way to turn the tables.

moves.name: Étoile
moves.definition: Launch your opponent into the air with a quick one-two combination of kicks, and follow up with a powerful leaping kick. This move executes quickly, making it useful as an anti-air attack or as a way to combo airborne opponents.

moves.name: Pas de Deux
moves.definition: Attack as though performing a ballet dance and then smash your opponent into the ground with a devastating slam. Can be used to slip through an opponent's guard at close range and deal tons of damage all at once.

moves.name: Knee Shot
moves.definition: An attack that stays active for a long time and allows you to move first even if it is blocked.

moves.name: Sunrise Heel
moves.definition: An axe kick with long reach that allows you to move first even if it is blocked.

moves.name: Face Breaker
moves.definition: A multi-hit kick that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Sliding Heel Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Funky Dance Feint
moves.definition: A sequence of two attacks into a feint. Useful for confusing an opponent.

moves.name: Speedy Maracas
moves.definition: A special move that builds your Super Art Gauge for as long as the command used to perform it is held.

moves.name: Roll Through Feint
moves.definition: Spin forward while feinting a kicking attack. Useful for confusing opponents at close range.

moves.name: Quick Rolling Sobat
moves.definition: Unleash a fierce spinning kick while moving forward. When used to check an opponent while vying for position, it is most effective when the tip of the foot connects with the opponent.

moves.name: Double Rolling Sobat
moves.definition: Unleash two fierce spinning kicks while moving forward. Its high damage makes it a potent way to finish combos.

moves.name: Jus Cool
moves.definition: A retreating sway that can lead into kicking attacks or forward-moving maneuvers.

moves.name: Funky Slicer
moves.definition: A low attack performed from Jus Cool that cannot be blocked standing. It is very quick, making it easy to use in combos or as a way of checking your opponent.

moves.name: Waning Moon
moves.definition: A roundhouse kick performed from Jus Cool that cannot be blocked crouching. You can continue your attack even if blocked, making it useful when worked into sequences intended to slip through an opponent's guard.

moves.name: Maximum Strike
moves.definition: A launching kick performed from Jus Cool. If done early it can be used as an anti-air attack, and is also effective as a combo starter.

moves.name: Juggling Dash
moves.definition: A quick forward-moving maneuver performed from Jus Cool. While in motion, you are invincible to projectiles.

moves.name: Juggling Sway
moves.definition: Allows for a hasty retreat after moving forward with a Juggling Dash. Useful as a feint to confuse opponents after making them think you're going to approach.

moves.name: Diss Track
moves.definition: Disrupt your opponent's balance, hop on their knee, and kick off of their face. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Flip Throw
moves.definition: Latch onto your opponent, place both feet on their torso, and toss them behind you while falling backward. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Wild Beat
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Leg Scratch
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Threebeat Combo
moves.definition: A quick combination attack that hits multiple times.

moves.name: Dee Jay Special
moves.definition: A series of attacks, the third of which can be canceled into Super Arts.

moves.name: Funky Dance
moves.definition: A multi-hit attack that doesn't leave you wide open even if stopped partway through.

moves.name: Party in the Air
moves.definition: A combination attack that is useful against jumping opponents.

moves.name: Air Slasher
moves.definition: Produce a forward-moving shockwave with a high-speed uppercut. Useful for checking opponents at range.

moves.name: Jackknife Maximum
moves.definition: Unleash a series of kicks while jumping diagonally upwards. Useful in combos and as an anti-air attack.

moves.name: Machine Gun Uppercut
moves.definition: A series of high-speed uppercuts. Slow to execute, but does massive damage if you manage to land it.

moves.name: The Greatest Sobat
moves.definition: Remain in place and put your whole body into a single spinning kick. It executes quickly, making it useful in combos and as a counterattack.

moves.name: Lowkey Sunrise Festival
moves.definition: Lunge forward and perform a sequence of attacks starting with a knee strike. All attacks after the first one must be activated by pressing buttons in the correct order.

moves.name: Marvelous Sunrise Festival
moves.definition: Lunge forward and perform a sequence of attacks starting with a knee strike. All attacks after the first one must be activated by pressing buttons in the correct order.

moves.name: Headliner Sunrise Festival
moves.definition: Lunge forward and perform a sequence of attacks starting with a knee strike. All attacks after the first one must be activated by pressing buttons in the correct order.

moves.name: Climactic Strike
moves.definition: Launch an opponent into the air with an uppercut and smack them in the face as they come back down. Switches positions with your opponent upon completion.

moves.name: Encore Beat
moves.definition: Plant both arms on the ground and kick upwards with both legs. Most effective when used with your opponent in the corner.

moves.name: Weekend Pleasure
moves.definition: Launch an opponent into the air with an uppercut and then unleash a powerful high-speed barrage of fists upon them as they come back down. Extremely versatile, this move is useful both in combos and as an anti-air attack.

moves.name: Harai Kick
moves.definition: A low attack with long reach that cannot be blocked standing.

moves.name: Dohyo Sweep
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Flying Sumo Press
moves.definition: A body press with an area of attack so wide that it can hit an opponent even if it crosses over them.

moves.name: Double Slaps
moves.definition: A quick series of attacks that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Toko Shizume
moves.definition: A series of attacks, the second of which cannot be blocked crouching.

moves.name: Sumo Dash
moves.definition: Move forward with a traditional sumo shuffle. Useful for closing the distance with your opponent.

moves.name: Taiho Cannon Lift
moves.definition: A sequence of two strikes performed from Sumo Dash that launch an opponent into the air. Can be used to deal big damage in combos performed on opponents who have left themselves wide open.

moves.name: Neko Damashi
moves.definition: Clap the palms of both hands together in front of your face. Not only can it be used as an attack, but it can also be used to negate projectiles.

moves.name: Sumo Spirit
moves.definition: Perform a sumo kata that enhances your next Hundred Hand Slap. This enhancement will be maintained until a Hundred Hand Slap is used.

moves.name: Saba Ori
moves.definition: Clasp both arms around your opponent's back, squeeze them, and slam them to the ground. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Tawara Throw
moves.definition: Clasp both arms around your opponent's back and toss them behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Sumo Crunch
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Raiden-Ho
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Power Stomp
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Hundred Hand Slap
moves.definition: Unleash a series of high-speed slaps. Useful for creating combos from normal moves.

moves.name: Sumo Headbutt
moves.definition: Fly horizontally forward with a powerful headbutt. Useful as a surprise attack to approach your opponent, as well as a way to tack on additional hits in combos.

moves.name: Sumo Smash
moves.definition: Leap diagonally into the air and then descend directly downward with a hip slam. Useful as a way to launch a surprise attack while avoiding grounded attacks, and as a way to pressure an opponent's guard.

moves.name: Oicho Throw
moves.definition: Grab your opponent by the head, slam them into the ground, and follow up with a Sumo Slam. Useful for breaking through an opponent's guard at close range.

moves.name: Teppo Triple Slap
moves.definition: A sequence of slaps performed from Sumo Dash. Useful for checking your opponent up close or as a way to continue your offensive pressure.

moves.name: Show of Force
moves.definition: Push your opponent out of the sumo ring with a mighty shove. This move is invincible at the beginning, making it useful for turning the tables on your opponent.

moves.name: Ultimate Killer Head Ram
moves.definition: Perform a headbutt followed by a sequence of slaps, and finish off with a final twisting headbutt. The initial headbutt travels a long distance, making it excellent both in combos and as a way of dealing with projectiles.

moves.name: The Final Bout
moves.definition: Swing your opponent in a circle to draw the outline of a sumo ring, then just as you're about to push them out of it, throw them to the ground behind you with a brutal slam. This move has long reach and comes out quickly, making it quite versatile.

moves.name: Yoga Uppercut
moves.definition: An anti-air attack that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Yoga Lance
moves.definition: A punch with long reach. Useful against opponents who jump diagonally forward.

moves.name: Nirvana Punch
moves.definition: A damaging punch that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Agile Kick
moves.definition: A quick low attack that cannot be blocked standing.

moves.name: Divine Kick
moves.definition: A quick kick that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Thrust Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that cannot be blocked standing and can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Long Sliding Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Aerial Yoga Float
moves.definition: While airborne, transition into a float. Jumping attacks and aerial special moves can be used while floating.

moves.name: Yoga Smash
moves.definition: Grab and punch your opponent's head twice before sending them flying with a palm strike. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Yoga Throw
moves.definition: Grab your opponent with both arms and toss them behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Yoga Splash
moves.definition: Grab an opponent's legs to disrupt their balance and send them flying. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Yoga Rise
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Yoga Illusion
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Yoga Mountain
moves.definition: A kick that is useful against an opponent's neutral jumps and blows the opponent back on hit.

moves.name: Karma Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that cannot be blocked standing and knocks an opponent down.

moves.name: Yoga Mummy
moves.definition: A special-cancelable descending attack that be performed while jumping.

moves.name: Drill Kick
moves.definition: A descending attack with a long duration that can be performed while jumping.

moves.name: Yoga Fire
moves.definition: Spit a ball of flame from your mouth. Useful in combos and for checking opponents from a distance.

moves.name: Yoga Arch
moves.definition: Spit a curving ball of flame from your mouth. Useful for filling space above you that's usually difficult to cover.

moves.name: Yoga Flame
moves.definition: Blow a large ball of flames from your mouth. Can be used both in combos and as a way to check your opponent while grounded.

moves.name: Yoga Blast
moves.definition: Blow a large ball of flames diagonally upward. Can be used both as an early anti-air attack and in aerial combos.

moves.name: Yoga Comet
moves.definition: Blow a ball of flame from mid-air aimed toward the ground. Useful as a way to check opponents from the air.

moves.name: Yoga Float
moves.definition: Rise into the air and float for a moment. Jumping attacks and aerial special moves can be used while floating.

moves.name: Yoga Teleport
moves.definition: Used to instantaneously warp set distances. Its invincibility on startup can be used to evade attacks, and can also be used to set up an offense.

moves.name: Aerial Yoga Teleport
moves.definition: Used to instantaneously warp set distances while in the air. Jumping attacks and aerial special moves can be used after completing the teleport.

moves.name: Yoga Inferno
moves.definition: Blow flames in a variety of directions. Its quick execution makes it useful as a counterattack or as a way of converting normal attacks into combos. The direction of the flame will change depending on which button you input.

moves.name: Yoga Sunburst
moves.definition: Blow an enormous mass of flames into the air which then fall to the ground. Can be used as an anti-air attack or in combos after knocking an opponent into the air.

moves.name: Merciless Yoga
moves.definition: A powerful move that unleashes a series of attacks followed by a devastating headbutt. Useful in combos, as an anti-air attack, or as a way to interrupt an opponent's pressure.

moves.name: Double Knee Bombs
moves.definition: A combination attack consisting of two forward-moving knee strikes.

moves.name: Wild Edge
moves.definition: A special-cancelable kick. Useful against jumping opponents.

moves.name: Wild Nail
moves.definition: An attack with long reach that slams an opponent into the ground. Can be followed up with a Coward Crouch on hit or on block.

moves.name: Amazon River Run
moves.definition: Slide along the ground toward your opponent. This is a low attack that cannot be blocked standing.

moves.name: Coward Crouch
moves.definition: Crouch in place and adopt a low stance. From this stance you can perform Wild Lift (an attack), or Raid Jump (a special jump).

moves.name: Wild Lift
moves.definition: A launching attack performed from Coward Crouch.

moves.name: Raid Jump
moves.definition: A forward jump performed from Coward Crouch.

moves.name: Surprise Forward Hop
moves.definition: A movement technique that allows you to swiftly advance toward your opponent. Useful for surprise attacks.

moves.name: Surprise Back Hop
moves.definition: A movement technique that allows you to swiftly fall back and place distance between you and your opponent.

moves.name: Electric Thunder
moves.definition: Envelop your entire body with electricity to shock your opponent. This move executes quickly, making it useful to combo into from normal moves.

moves.name: Blanka-chan Bomb
moves.definition: Toss out a Blanka-chan doll designed to resemble Blanka himself. Once it lands on the ground, touching it with an electrical special move will cause it to run toward and attack your opponent.

moves.name: Rolling Cannon
moves.definition: A spinning attack that can be used while Lightning Beast is active. It allows for rolling-type special moves to be followed up with up to three additional attacks.

moves.name: Wild Fang
moves.definition: Latch onto your opponent, bite them a few times, and kick off of them. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Jungle Flip
moves.definition: Place your hands on your opponent's shoulders, climb on top of them, then send them tumbling as you kick off their back. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Wild Bites
moves.definition: Grab an airborne opponent, bite them while falling to the ground, and then bite them once again. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Wild Scratch
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Quick Rolling Attack
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Rock Crusher
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Rolling Attack
moves.definition: Curl your body into a ball and fly forward with a spinning tackle. Useful for launching surprise attacks from far away.

moves.name: Vertical Rolling Attack
moves.definition: Curl your body into a ball and rise upward with a spinning tackle. This move has invincibility against jumping attacks while it is rising.

moves.name: Backstep Rolling Attack
moves.definition: Take a quick step backwards, then perform a spinning tackle through the air in a triangular arc. Useful when launching an offensive intended to confuse your opponent.

moves.name: Aerial Rolling Attack
moves.definition: Quickly descend from the air with a spinning tackle. Effective when used as a surprise attack while feigning a backward jump.

moves.name: Wild Hunt
moves.definition: Leap at an opponent, pin them down, and scratch them multiple times. Useful for slipping through the guard of opponents who are committed to blocking.

moves.name: Shout of Earth
moves.definition: Leap into the air and slam both fists into the ground, creating a powerful electric shock. Its invincibility makes it useful for turning the tables, but it is also effective in combos.

moves.name: Lightning Beast
moves.definition: Electrically charge your own body to power up your special moves and Super Arts. It also enables the use of Rolling Cannon from all rolling-type special moves.

moves.name: Ground Shave Cannonball
moves.definition: Leap onto your opponent and bite them multiple times before slamming into them with an electrically charged spinning tackle. The leap performed upon activation can be used to deal with projectiles.

moves.name: Low Spinning Sweep
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Quick Dash
moves.definition: Swiftly sprint a set distance forward.

moves.name: Emergency Stop
moves.definition: Performed from Quick Dash, this maneuver will make you stop dead in your tracks.

moves.name: Thunder Kick
moves.definition: An overhead attack performed from Quick Dash that cannot be blocked crouching.

moves.name: Forward Step Kick
moves.definition: A forward kick with long reach that is performed from Quick Dash.

moves.name: Chin Buster
moves.definition: A quick series of attacks that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Aerial Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
moves.definition: A Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku performed while airborne. Useful for altering the trajectory of your jump, or for staging a surprise attack from above.

moves.name: Kazekama Shin Kick
moves.definition: A low kick performed from Jinrai Kick that cannot be blocked standing. Useful against opponents who try to move after your Jinrai Kick.

moves.name: Kasai Thrust Kick
moves.definition: A sequence of kicks performed following any type of OD Jinrai Kick. Useful for slipping through your opponent's guard to tack on additional damage.

moves.name: Gorai Axe Kick
moves.definition: An axe kick performed from Jinrai Kick that cannot be blocked crouching. Useful against opponents who try to stiffen their guard against your Jinrai Kick.

moves.name: Senka Snap Kick
moves.definition: A roundhouse that can be used to combo from Jinrai Kick. Effective when used to make a combo after landing a Jinrai Kick.

moves.name: Knee Strikes
moves.definition: Grab your opponent, disrupt their balance with a knee strike, and toss them forward. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Hell Wheel
moves.definition: Grab your opponent and roll backwards with your foot placed on their torso. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Flame Strike
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Lightning Crack
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Triple Flash Kicks
moves.definition: A sequence of three kicks with long reach.

moves.name: Hadoken
moves.definition: Fire a ki blast directly forward. Useful for attacking opponents at range.

moves.name: Shoryuken
moves.definition: Leap into the sky with a devastating uppercut. Useful as an anti-air attack or as a way to end combos.

moves.name: Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
moves.definition: Unleash a series of roundhouse kicks while moving forward. Useful when canceled into from normal moves to create combos.

moves.name: Dragonlash Kick
moves.definition: A leaping roundhouse kick that pulls your opponent toward you. An extremely versatile move that can be used to launch surprise attacks from mid-range, as a way to continue your offensive pressure, or in combos.

moves.name: Jinrai Kick
moves.definition: A forward-moving roundhouse kick that can be followed up by one of three different kicks.

moves.name: Dragonlash Flame
moves.definition: Launch your opponent into the sky and then perform a series of kicks on them while airborne. It is invincible at the beginning, and you switch positions with your opponent upon completion.

moves.name: Shippu Jinrai-kyaku
moves.definition: Unleash a flurry of kicks and then finish with a rising Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku. This move is quick to execute, making it useful for counterattacks and in combos.

moves.name: Shinryu Reppa
moves.definition: A one-two Shoryuken combination followed by one final mighty Shoryuken with an added spin to it. If the first hit misses, a single additional Shoryuken will come out afterward.

moves.name: Kyosesho
moves.definition: A forward-moving attack that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Senkai Kick
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Renko Kicks
moves.definition: A two-hit sequence of kicks that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Korenzan
moves.definition: A multi-hit kick that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Slash Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Saihasho
moves.definition: A roundhouse kick that fires a projectile low to the ground. Useful for checking your opponents, in combos, or as a way to start offensive pressure.

moves.name: Ankensatsu
moves.definition: Leap forward in a low arc and come down with an axe kick. Useful as a way to approach while avoiding attacks targeted at your feet, and can also be used in combos.

moves.name: Go Ohsatsu
moves.definition: Lunge forward and let fly a swift overhead roundhouse. Its long reach makes it effective when used for surprise attacks from a distance, and it can also be canceled into from normal moves to make combos.

moves.name: Shiku-sen
moves.definition: A surprise attack performed by kicking while airborne. Useful for surprise attacks or as a way to approach your opponent.

moves.name: Shiren-sen
moves.definition: A series of kicks performed from Shiku-sen that tack on additional damage and knock the opponent down.

moves.name: Spider Fang Throw
moves.definition: Grab your opponent's head with your foot to make them hunch over, and send them flying with two kicks. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Shadow Kick Throw
moves.definition: Use one foot to knock your opponent down, and follow up by stepping on their back. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Zanka-sen
moves.definition: Latch onto an airborne opponent's back and kick them to the ground behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Sekkan Kick
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Kaita Raid
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Death Crest
moves.definition: A combination attack that sends an opponent flying.

moves.name: Fuhajin
moves.definition: Perform an upwards kick while capturing ki from your immediate surroundings. Increases your Fuha stock by 1 upon completion.

moves.name: Tensenrin
moves.definition: Rotate like a windmill while unleashing a series of kicks. Can be used in a variety of situations to deal big damage.

moves.name: Sakkai Fuhazan
moves.definition: Fire multiple ki blasts with a kick and follow it up with another giant ki blast to knock an opponent away. Easy to work into aerial combos against opponents who have been launched into the air.

moves.name: Feng Shui Engine
moves.definition: Power up your abilities by unleashing the power of the Feng Shui Engine embedded in your eye. Once powered up, you will be able to cancel normal moves into other normal moves or even unique attacks.

moves.name: Kaisen Dankai Raku
moves.definition: Unleash the full power of the Feng Shui Engine to perform a powerful sequence of attacks. Useful when trying to tack on big damage during combos or when turning the tables on your opponent.

moves.name: Water Slicer Slide
moves.definition: Slide along the ground toward your opponent. This is a low attack that cannot be blocked standing.

moves.name: Windmill Kick
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Hisen Kick
moves.definition: A leaping kick with long reach. Useful as a counter to an opponent's sweeps.

moves.name: Step Up
moves.definition: Performed from Hisen Kick, this maneuver can be used to jump in one of three directions.

moves.name: Water Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Elbow Drop
moves.definition: A descending attack with a long duration that can be performed while jumping.

moves.name: Bushin Tiger Fangs
moves.definition: A quick series of attacks that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Bushin Hellchain Throw
moves.definition: A combination attack that switches places with your opponent.

moves.name: Aerial Bushin Senpukyaku
moves.definition: A Bushin Senpukyaku performed while jumping. Effective when used to combo opponents being juggled in the air.

moves.name: Sprint
moves.definition: Swiftly dash forward to close the distance with your opponent, during which a variety of moves can be performed.

moves.name: Emergency Stop
moves.definition: Halt Sprint's movement to adjust the distance you cover or as a way to reduce how much you leave yourself open following a Sprint.

moves.name: Torso Cleaver
moves.definition: A somersault kick performed from Sprint. Effective as an anti-air attack targeting opponents who tend to jump around a lot.

moves.name: Shadow Slide
moves.definition: A sliding attack aimed at an opponent's feet, performed from Sprint. It is a low attack that cannot be blocked standing, and is effective when used as a surprise attack from a distance.

moves.name: Neck Hunter
moves.definition: An overhead swinging kick performed from Sprint. It cannot be blocked crouching, and is useful as a way to break through an opponent's guard.

moves.name: Arc Step
moves.definition: Approach your opponent with Sprint and then kick off their body to leap backwards. Can be followed up with either an attack or a throw after the leap.

moves.name: Bushin Izuna Otoshi
moves.definition: A throw attack performed from Arc Step in which you leap onto and grab your opponent. Useful against opponents who keep their guard up after blocking Arc Step.

moves.name: Bushin Hojin Kick
moves.definition: A move performed from Arc Step in which you descend diagonally with a swift kick. Useful in combos and as a way to lock down opponents who try to move after Arc Step.

moves.name: Hidden Variable
moves.definition: Conceal yourself with smoke and instantly appear before your opponent. Useful as a way to close the distance with your opponent or as a way to launch a surprise offensive.

moves.name: Genius at Play
moves.definition: Tamper with a spray can to get an additional stock. Once stocked, input the same command again to activate a Shuriken Bomb.

moves.name: Nue Twister
moves.definition: Grab an airborne opponent and smash them into the ground below. Its high damage makes it an effective anti-air or mid-air combo option.

moves.name: Ripcord Throw
moves.definition: Break your opponent's poise with a chop, leap over them to disrupt their balance, and toss them aside. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Bell Ringer
moves.definition: Place both legs on your opponent's torso and perform a knee strike, then use the force of pulling them toward the ground to throw them behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Steadfast Strike
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Shapeless State
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Bushin Prism Strikes
moves.definition: A quick combination attack that hits multiple times.

moves.name: Bushin Hellchain
moves.definition: A combination attack that sends an opponent flying.

moves.name: Bushin Senpukyaku
moves.definition: Unleash a series of spinning kicks while leaping into the air. Useful in combos and as an anti-air attack.

moves.name: Vagabond Edge
moves.definition: Lunge forward while unleashing a powerful chop. Useful when canceled into from normal moves to create combos. The heavy and Overdrive versions can be canceled with a jump.

moves.name: Shuriken Bomb
moves.definition: Toss out and set a spray can that will explode after a period of time. Best used to apply pressure that capitalizes on the duration between when the bomb is placed and its detonation.

moves.name: Shuriken Bomb Spread
moves.definition: Toss out and set two spray cans that will explode after a period of time. Can be used following an OD Genius at Play.

moves.name: Bushin Beats
moves.definition: Rush forward and knock down an opponent, then follow up with a flurry of attacks. Use this as a part of a combo while on the ground, or as a follow-up attack if they're airborne.

moves.name: Bushin Thunderous Beats
moves.definition: Adds a Shuriken Bomb follow-up attack after using Bushin Beats. Damage increases but requires one stock of Shuriken Bombs to activate.

moves.name: Bushin Scramble
moves.definition: Ensnare the opponent with a dive bomb-like attack from the air, and then pelt them relentlessly with mid-air attacks. An excellent choice against projectiles or airborne opponents.

moves.name: Soaring Bushin Scramble
moves.definition: Activate Bushin Scramble in mid-air to dive bomb the opponent and attack them relentlessly. Easy to use in a combo from a mid-air special move.

moves.name: Bushin Ninjastar Cypher
moves.definition: Launch the opponent into the air, and attack them while detonating numerous spray cans. After the attack, Kimberly's walk speed and attack power will be boosted.

moves.name: Burning Straight
moves.definition: A quick strike that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Spinning Back Knuckle
moves.definition: Move forward while striking with the back of your fist. Allows you to move before your opponent even if blocked.

moves.name: Knee Bazooka
moves.definition: A forward-moving knee strike that's quick and difficult to counterattack. Can be performed while maintaining your backward charge.

moves.name: Rolling Sobat
moves.definition: A quick hop kick that's difficult to counterattack. Depending on what direction you hold, you can move either forward or backward while performing it

moves.name: Recoil Cannon
moves.definition: A combination attack that sends an opponent flying.

moves.name: Double Shot
moves.definition: A quick series of attacks that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Drake Fang
moves.definition: A low attack followed by an overhead attack.

moves.name: Dragon Sweep
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Phantom Cutter
moves.definition: A low attack into a high kick that launches an opponent into the air. These two hits form a combo if done as a Punish Counter.

moves.name: Dragon Suplex
moves.definition: Whirl behind your opponent and, while grabbing one of their arms and their head, slam them into the ground with a suplex. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Judo Throw
moves.definition: Grab your opponent and toss them behind you, placing their weight on your arm and shoulder. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Flying Mare
moves.definition: Grab an airborne opponent and toss them to the ground below. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Flying Buster Drop
moves.definition: Grab an airborne opponent and smash their back with your shoulder as you descend. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Blitz Combination
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Strike Eagle
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Full Bullet Magnum
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Reverse Spin Kick
moves.definition: An attack with long reach that is useful against an opponent's sweeps.

moves.name: Guile High Kick
moves.definition: A high kick that is useful against jumping opponents. Can be performed while maintaining your downward charge.

moves.name: Sonic Boom
moves.definition: Cross your arms with such speed that you fire a rotating aerial slash. Useful for checking distant opponents or as a way to start offensive pressure.

moves.name: Somersault Kick
moves.definition: Perform a backwards somersault while unleashing a devastating kick. It is invincible against jumping attacks, making it useful as an anti-air technique.

moves.name: Sonic Blade
moves.definition: Used to fire aerial slashes while Solid Puncher is active. The speed of the projectile can be modified with directional inputs.

moves.name: Sonic Cross
moves.definition: Combine Sonic Blade with another aerial slash and fire it as a projectile.

moves.name: Sonic Break
moves.definition: Used to fire aerial slashes while Solid Puncher is active. Can be repeated up to 4 times, and can also be input following a Sonic Boom for additional attacks.

moves.name: Sonic Hurricane
moves.definition: Fire a massive aerial slash directly ahead. An extremely versatile move that can be used in combos, to counter projectiles, or as a way to turn the tables when being pressured. The angle of the attack can be changed depending on the command input.

moves.name: Solid Puncher
moves.definition: Envelop both arms in aerial slashes and enables the use of Sonic Break.

moves.name: Crossfire Somersault
moves.definition: Launch your opponent into the air and follow up with a mighty somersault kick. It has invincibility at the beginning, making it useful as an anti-air attack or as a way to turn the tables on your opponent.

moves.name: Swift Thrust
moves.definition: A strike with long reach that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Hakkei
moves.definition: A strong attack with quick recovery time.

moves.name: Yokusen Kick
moves.definition: A jumping kick with long reach that is effective against an opponent's sweeps.

moves.name: Gen Assassin Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Serenity Stream
moves.definition: Adopt a very low, stationary fighting stance. While in this stance, each attack button produces different attacks.

moves.name: Forward Strike
moves.definition: A quick, low kick, performed during Serenity Stream.

moves.name: Senpu Kick
moves.definition: A low kick with long reach, performed during Serenity Stream.

moves.name: Tenku Kick
moves.definition: A launching kick, performed during Serenity Stream. Can immediately be canceled into a jump on hit.

moves.name: Lightning Kick Barrage
moves.definition: A series of kicks that can be performed following an OD Hundred Lightning Kicks. Useful for tacking on additional damage while also knocking down your opponent.

moves.name: Koshuto
moves.definition: Seize your opponent by the arm, spin them around you, and throw them aside. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Taiji Fan
moves.definition: Disrupt your opponent's balance with an elbow strike, scoop them up, and toss them behind you. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Ryuseiraku
moves.definition: Catch your opponent in mid-air and slam them into the ground. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Hosen Kick
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Hoyoku Kick
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Water Lotus Fist
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Falling Crane
moves.definition: A knee strike performed after placing yourself behind your opponent while leaping into the air.

moves.name: Yoso Kick
moves.definition: A stomping attack performed while jumping. Follow-ups can be performed after the first hit connects with or is blocked by the opponent.

moves.name: Wall Jump
moves.definition: While jumping, kick off a wall to perform another jump.

moves.name: Soaring Eagle Punches
moves.definition: A series of attacks performed while jumping.

moves.name: Orchid Palm
moves.definition: A quick strike, performed during Serenity Stream.

moves.name: Snake Strike
moves.definition: A forward-moving, repeatable low profile strike, performed during Serenity Stream.

moves.name: Lotus Fist
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching, performed during Serenity Stream.

moves.name: Kikoken
moves.definition: Fire a ki blast directly forward. Useful for attacking opponents at range.

moves.name: Hundred Lightning Kicks
moves.definition: Unleash a series of high-speed kicks. Useful for creating combos out of normal attacks.

moves.name: Aerial Hundred Lightning Kicks
moves.definition: A Hundred Lightning Kicks performed while jumping. Effective when used to convert a jumping attack into a combo.

moves.name: Spinning Bird Kick
moves.definition: A series of rotating, upside-down kicks with your legs extended wide. This move does lots of damage, and is useful when performing combos against opponents that have left themselves wide open.

moves.name: Hazanshu
moves.definition: Leap forward, rotate in the air, and slam your leg downward with a powerful kick. Useful for checking an opponent's sweeps, or as a way to close distance.
