moves.name: Tensho Kicks
moves.definition: Rise into the air with multiple kicks. Useful for countering an opponent's jumping attacks, or as a way to close out combos.

moves.name: Kikosho
moves.definition: Create a mass of energy directly in front of you. Its swift speed and invulnerability can quickly turn the tables on an opponent.

moves.name: Aerial Kikosho
moves.definition: Fire a kikosho diagonally downward while jumping. Effective when used to convert a jumping attack into a combo.

moves.name: Hoyoku-sen
moves.definition: Move forward while unleashing a series of kicks and then launch your opponent into the air. The last hit can be immediately canceled into a jump.

moves.name: Soten Ranka
moves.definition: Perform a roundhouse kick, knock your opponent into the air with a series of attacks, and then smash them with a devastating kick. Useful for tacking on big damage in a combo, or as a quick way to turn the tables.

moves.name: Tensei Kick
moves.definition: A launching kick that can immediately be jumped out of on hit.

moves.name: Shikai Kick
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Falling Star Kick
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Hermit's Elbow
moves.definition: An elbow strike that can be canceled into Super Arts. This move's effect changes at drink level 3, making it more powerful.

moves.name: Senei Kick
moves.definition: A lunging kick that can be canceled into Super Arts. This move's effect changes at drink level 4, making it more powerful.

moves.name: Ransui Haze(3rd hit / longest possible delay)
The Devil Inside
moves.definition: Take out a gourd for a swig of a ki-unleashing drink. Raises your drink level, with higher levels unlocking access to additional moves.

moves.name: Tenshin
moves.definition: A throw that stops the opponent's movements by thrusting a finger in front of their eyes. After the hit connects, it can be followed up with a swift attack.

moves.name: Swagger Hermit Punch
moves.definition: A follow-up attack performed out of Swagger Step, unleashing an even more devastating strike with the heel of your palm. It does very high damage, making it particularly powerful in combos or as a surprise attack.

moves.name: Back Shaver
moves.definition: Lean your back into your opponent and send them tumbling backwards with three strong strikes. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Wheel Punch
moves.definition: Crumple your opponent with a kick, then roll over them before sending them packing with another kick. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Vainglory Strike
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Leg Sweep
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Phantom Sway
moves.definition: A sequence of attacks, the first of which cannot be blocked standing. Your drink level will go up after the part of the attack where you take a drink is complete.

moves.name: Bitter Strikes
moves.definition: A quick series of attacks that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Full Moon Kick
moves.definition: A sequence of attacks, the first of which cannot be blocked crouching. Your drink level will go up after the part of the attack where you take a drink is complete.

moves.name: Intoxicated Assault
moves.definition: A counter followed by a sequence of attacks.

moves.name: Ransui Haze
moves.definition: Bewilder your opponent while falling back. The move's behavior will change depending on the timing of your input while falling back.

moves.name: Freeflow Strikes
moves.definition: Move forward while performing three attacks with your fists. Useful for starting combos from regular attacks.

moves.name: Freeflow Kicks
moves.definition: Perform an attack with your fists followed by a sequence of kicking attacks. Your drink level will go up once all parts of the move have finished.

moves.name: Swagger Step
moves.definition: Quickly lunge toward your opponent and strike with the heel of your palm. Useful as a surprise attack that closes the distance with your opponent.

moves.name: Arrow Kick
moves.definition: Launch your opponent into the air with a kick, and then use the recoil to follow up with a flying kick. Useful as an anti-air counter to an opponent's jumping attacks, and as a way to close out combos.

moves.name: Luminous Dive Kick
moves.definition: While jumping, extend your leg and quickly descend to the ground. Useful as a surprise attack, or as a way to approach your opponent.

moves.name: Bakkai
moves.definition: A series of rotating, upside-down kicks while sliding along the ground. This move does big damage, and is useful when performing combos against opponents that have left themselves wide open.

moves.name: Breakin'
moves.definition: A sequence of acrobatic rotating kicks at high speed. During the attack, keep holding down to raise your drink level.

moves.name: The Devil's Song
moves.definition: Unleash even stronger ki by taking a big gulp from your gourd. Your drink level will be maxed out for a period of time after finishing the move.

moves.name: Getsuga Saiho
moves.definition: A sequence of attacks that breaks an opponent's posture, and then finishes by kicking them into the air after forcing them to take a swing at you. After the opponent has been launched, it is possible to continue your offensive with a follow-up attack.

moves.name: Rawhide
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Suppressor
moves.definition: A strike unleashed after stepping backward. Can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Trench Breaker
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: Nose Breaker
moves.definition: An attack consisting of multiple hits, the first of which cannot be blocked while standing.

moves.name: Fatal Shot
moves.definition: Fire an additional shockwave after an OD Sand Blast. Useful for securing some damage after trading projectiles.

moves.name: DDT
moves.definition: A powerful throw activated from the first hit of an OD Flash Knuckle. Useful for when you want to guarantee some extra damage.

moves.name: Aerial Flash Knuckle
moves.definition: A Flash Knuckle performed while jumping. Can be used to alter the trajectory of your jump, making it useful for surprise attacks. Can also be worked into aerial combos.

moves.name: Avenger
moves.definition: Charge ahead in a forward-leaning stance. Other moves can be executed out of Avenger by pressing a button during its animation.

moves.name: No Chaser
moves.definition: A powerful tackle that can be executed during Avenger. This attack is active for a while, making it a useful tool for closing in on your opponent.

moves.name: Impaler
moves.definition: An overhead kick that can be executed during Avenger and cannot be blocked while crouching. Useful when trying to sneak through an opponent's guard, or as part of a combo.

moves.name: Slam Dunk
moves.definition: An attack executed from an OD Rising Uppercut that slams an opponent to the ground. In addition to its high damage, it leaves you in an advantageous position afterward.

moves.name: Sweeper
moves.definition: Grab your opponent, lift them up, and slam them onto their back. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Scrapper
moves.definition: Grab your opponent's head and send them flying with two knee strikes. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Muzzle Flash
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Battering Ram
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Outlaw Kick
moves.definition: A powerful anti-air high kick.

moves.name: Double Impact
moves.definition: A series of attacks performed while moving forward. The second attack can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Triple Impact
moves.definition: A quick series of attacks that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Snapback Combo
moves.definition: A series of attacks, the first and second of which can be canceled into Super Arts.

moves.name: Sand Blast
moves.definition: Fire a shockwave of pressure from your fist. Useful for checking an opponent from a distance, and as a stopgap in combos.

moves.name: Flash Knuckle
moves.definition: A full powered, chargeable punch. Increase the damage output by holding down the button at the beginning. Release the button when you see a flash to further boost its properties.

moves.name: Rising Uppercut
moves.definition: Unleash a ferocious punch as you leap diagonally upwards. It grants immunity to jumping attacks, making it useful as an anti-air technique.

moves.name: Vulcan Blast
moves.definition: Fire multiple high-speed Sand Blasts. Its swift speed makes it useful in projectile wars and in combos.

moves.name: Eraser
moves.definition: A series of punches punctuated by a powerful finishing blow that sends an opponent flying. Connecting with the first hit is enough to activate the combination attack that follows.

moves.name: Pale Rider
moves.definition: Charge and mount the opponent before unloading a flurry of powerful punches. It has long forward range, making it useful in combos, or as a way to deal with projectiles.

moves.name: Collarbone Breaker
moves.definition: An overhead attack that cannot be blocked while crouching.

moves.name: Solar Plexus Strike
moves.definition: A forward-moving attack that allows you to act before an opponent even if blocked.

moves.name: Axe Kick
moves.definition: A multi-hit kick that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Whirlwind Kick
moves.definition: A kick with long reach. Useful as a counter to an opponent's sweeps.

moves.name: Low Spinning Sweep
moves.definition: A low attack that can't be blocked while standing, which will knock your opponent down if it hits.

moves.name: High Double Strike
moves.definition: A multi-hit attack with a lenient input window for follow-ups.

moves.name: Aerial Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
moves.definition: A Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku performed while airborne. Useful for altering the trajectory of your jump, or for staging a surprise attack from above.

moves.name: Denjin Charge
moves.definition: Envelop your fists with the Power of Nothingness, enhancing moves such as the Hadoken and Hashogeki. Leaves you wide open, making the timing of its usage critical.

moves.name: Shoulder Throw
moves.definition: Grab your opponent and—bearing the brunt of their weight with your arm and back—toss them forward. Throws your opponent without switching places with them.

moves.name: Somersault Throw
moves.definition: Grab your opponent, place your foot on their torso, and throw them behind you as you fall backwards. Throws your opponent while switching places with them.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Shingeki
moves.definition: Lunge forward with a powerful attack. Can be used to absorb an opponent's attack while launching your own offensive.

moves.name: Drive Reversal: Chest Strike
moves.definition: Can be used after blocking an attack to quickly turn a defensive position into an offensive one.

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.definition: Adopt a stance that allows you to deflect all opponent strikes. This stance can be sustained by holding down the command used to activate it.

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward from a Drive Parry stance. Normal or unique attacks performed while moving will have their properties changed.

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.definition: Immediately move forward out of an attack. Can be performed during any special-cancelable move.

moves.name: Short Uppercut
moves.definition: A quick strike that can be canceled into special moves.

moves.name: Fuwa Triple Strike
moves.definition: A multi-hit attack that doesn't leave you wide open even if stopped partway through.

moves.name: Hadoken
moves.definition: Fire a ki blast directly forward. Useful for attacking opponents at range.

moves.name: Shoryuken
moves.definition: Leap into the air and perform a powerful uppercut. A Shoryuken is invincible to an opponent's jumping attacks, making it a great anti-air tool.

moves.name: Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
moves.definition: Unleash a series of roundhouse kicks while moving forward. A useful attack for knocking opponents away.

moves.name: High Blade Kick
moves.definition: A thrust kick that quickly closes distance, and can be used to surprise an opponent between their attacks. Strike with the tip of the foot for maximum effectiveness.

moves.name: Hashogeki
moves.definition: Concentrate ki in the palm and unleash it directly forward. Useful as a follow-up after blocks and combos.

moves.name: Shinku Hadoken
moves.definition: A Hadoken in which the body's ki is concentrated and condensed into your palms before firing. Its swift speed and invulnerability can quickly turn the tables on an opponent.

moves.name: Shin Hashogeki
moves.definition: A Hashogeki enhanced through spiritual focus. Hold the button to charge the attack and increase its power.

moves.name: Shin Shoryuken
moves.definition: A powerful Shoryuken unleashed at short range. An overwhelming technique that aims for an opponent's vitals.
